Detailed Description

Provides various arithmetic methods.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_AddGreyLevelImageConstant ( FIBITMAP *  dst,
double  constant 
)

Add a greylevel image by a constant.

Parameters:
dst FIBITMAP bitmap to perform the add this also serves as the output.
constant Constant used to perform the add.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

FIBITMAP *  src 
)

Add two greylevel images.

Parameters:
dst FIBITMAP first bitmap to perform the add this also serves as the output.
src FIBITMAP second bitmap to perform the add operation on.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

Calculate the complex conjugate of a complex image.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap must be of type complex.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Log ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Return the log image.

This function returns an image where the log of each pixel is taken.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap to perform the log operation on.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Transpose ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Transpose an image.

This function transposes the image data. Ie its row and columns are swapped.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap to transpose.
